content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipes connecting them.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) 

### Copper cable factory
No structures found related to copper cable factory.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing pipes
-  Ensure you are close enough to the target position to place the pipe. Move closer to the target position before attempting to place the pipe.
-  Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place the pipe. Remove any existing entities at the target position before continuing.
-  Ensure there are no existing objects in the way of the target position. Clear any obstacles before attempting to place the pipe.

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Make sure the entities are compatible and can be connected.
-  Ensure the entities are close enough to each other to be connected.
-  Ensure the pipe group connected to the offshore pump and steam engine are the same.

### Errors when using API
-  Check the API documentation to ensure correct usage of functions.
-  Ensure all required parameters are provided when calling API functions.
-  Handle any exceptions that may be thrown by API functions.
